description: This file defines data models for a recipe application, including enums and classes representing ingredients, recipe steps, and complete recipes with properties such as ID, title, image, duration, difficulty, tags, ingredients, steps, and optional nutrition info.

classes.name: Ingredient
classes.description: Represents an ingredient with a name and quantity, including a convenience factory method.

classes.name: RecipeStep
classes.description: Represents a cooking step with a step number and description.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Encapsulates all details of a recipe, including ingredients, steps, difficulty, and other metadata, with a copyWith method for creating modified copies.

methods.name: Ingredient.q
methods.description: Factory constructor for quick creation of Ingredient instances.

methods.name: Recipe.copyWith
methods.description: Returns a copy of the Recipe with specified fields overridden.
